name: Fringe's DeadlyConcert
description:
(Action-adventure, Arcade, Platformer) - Fringe is a teenage girl, who after getting bad grades, decides to sneak out and see her favourite band Teardrop Liar. Along the way, she battles enemies, loses her ticket and once inside; has to make her way to the mosh pit for the final battle.

Battle your way through this Retro-Arcade style, Action packed adventure with Fringe and her friends. Work your way through the story's platforming levels and help Fringe make it to the Concert!

FDC will be receiving a stream of content updates over the course of the next 12 months all included with the base version of Fringe's DeadlyConcert!

First Major Content drop due April 27th introducing 4 NEW LEVELS!! Plus a sneak peak of Fringe's next adventure!!
